metadata.description: Community Claude Code plugins for data portals, Census API, electricity grid data, and copywriting

plugins.name: chicago-data-portal
plugins.description: Query Chicago's open data using Socrata/SODA API

plugins.name: cook-county-data-portal
plugins.description: Query Cook County's open data (property, courts, medical examiner)

plugins.name: gridstatus-api
plugins.description: Query electricity grid data from US ISOs (load, LMP prices, fuel mix)

plugins.name: housing-copywriter
plugins.description: Write authentic marketing copy and pro-housing advocacy messaging

plugins.name: us-census-data
plugins.description: Query US Census Bureau API (ACS, Decennial, Population Estimates)
